description: Smallest primes of form Q+c, where Q is the n-th primorial and c is composite>=Prime[n+1]^2.
comments: Remark that between 2310 and 2531, 26 primes(2311,...,2521) can be found, all of them have [primorial+prime] form. Observe that a(2)=31=2.3+5^2=2.3.5+1, so it has two "primorial forms"...
example: At n=5, 5th primorial is A002110(5)=2310 and 2310+221=2531 is the prime of demanded form, where 221 is composite.
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 04 2000
